snippet: David Krejci scored the shootout winner and had an assist in regulation as the visiting Boston Bruins defeated the Ottawa Senators, 3-2.
abstract: Boston Bruins defeat Ottawa Senators, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: David Krejci scored the shootout winner and had an assist in regulation as the visiting Boston Bruins defeated the Ottawa Senators, 3-2.

headline.seo: Bruins Top the Senators in a Shootout
headline.main: Bruins Top the Senators in a Shootout
